channel.title: Server error: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.arrayindexoutofboundsexceptio
channel.description:
this is the error I get when I try and run my server.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.arrayindedoutofboundsexception: 17

item.title: Server error: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.arrayindexoutofboundsexceptio
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:4, topic:359545”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=455996.msg3338504#msg3338504 date=1284159828]
Can you post the whole error?
[/quote]
No, he wants us to play a guessing game

I wanna say you added an item to item.cfg with to many numbers after it. Or you added to many drops for a particular npc.[/quote]
K I’m good at guessing games, HERE’S MY GUESS
You’re trying to access an index in an array that’s beyond the array’s capacity in the NPCdrops or Item.cfg (I copied what deathchaos said).

Read full topic
item.source: Server error: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.arrayindexoutofboundsexceptio
